reviews.review: Loved everything. Watched it twice and might make it a third
Amazing film. I will definitely see this again. I think this could be my favourite film ever.
Best movie in the series yet.
It was incredibly apparent that this was a fan service film to set up the captain marvel film ;nevertheless, it was an good film

Vingadores: Guerra Infinita é um filme divertido, extremamente impactante e perfeitamente bem orquestrado pelos diretores Joe e Anthony Russo. É impressionante como a difícil tarefa de reunir 30 heróis e 10 anos de universo cinematográfico em um filme foi bem planejada e bem executada. Cada personagem tem sua participação (alguns com mais tempo de tela que outros), envolvimento emocional e quando é necessário que existam momentos de ovação e tristeza com cada um deles, tudo é feito incrivelmente. Alguns heróis (como Feiticeira Escarlate, Thor e Gamora) têm maior importância que outros, mas o grande brilho não está em nenhum deles, mas sim no vilão. Thanos tem sua motivação, seu plano e sua relação com a filha é um dos grandes focos do filme. A computação gráfica é perfeita e é possível sentir as emoções do personagem digital, como se fosse um ator real em cena. Acredito que este já possa ser considerado um jovem clássico no cinema de super-heróis, ditando todos aqueles que virão pela frente tanto no Universo Marvel quanto em todos os outros universos. Depois de assistir, só nos resta esperar pela conclusão em Vingadores: Ultimato e estou contando os segundos para que chegue logo.

Nota: 5 (PERFEITO)
Best marvel movie to date. Great villain, great epic story.
AMAZING MOVIE. It's the opposite of what people is expecting.

Overhyped movie.  Avengers are good,  but the villain...  Wants to help  humanity to survive by killing half of it.  Hey,  super intelligent Titan,  you have the mighty gauntlet,  so why not use it and dispense resources?  Or teleport people to better places...  Your super brain is lazy,  kill them off!

Now that was a good movie. To be able to take movie most fans have been waiting over a decade for, and to have it meet and in some ways exceed expectations is AMAZING. I couldn't believe that I had been a theatre for nearly 3 hours after the movie was over. Moreover, the theatre I was in was having audio issues but after 15 minutes I completely forgot about the issue and was so completely captivated by the movie. Pacing was great, all the FX were awesome. For a cliffhanger ending I was totally satisfied and have no issue waiting however long it is going to take for the next movie to come out. I don't know if I've ever felt that satisfied with a cliffhanger in my life. Oh, and the best part, I couldn't find any plot holes. Granted I've only seen the movie once now, so we'll have to see how the second, third, fourth, and fifth viewing hold up!

Hard to find words, a lot going on here. Love the Russo brothers, loved Thanos, Cap's beard should win best supporting actor Oscar, Thor and Peter Quill power struggle very funny. Loved it, it was a massive effort that was pulled off with almost no plot holes (have to see it again to be certain), to wonderful and sometimes shocking effect. Go see it in the theaters, great group viewing event; everything has been building to this moment. You cannot progress with MCU until you see this movie and you should def be up-to-date before viewing. Wakanda is best host nation ever.
